Question: This person and the Colts tied a NFL record by winning 3 games in a season in which they trailed by at least 14 points.
Hints: In the divisional playoffs, this person led the Colts to a 38–31 win over the Kansas City Chiefs.
At San Diego, this person threw for 255 yards, 2 TDs and 1 INT in a 23–20 victory.
This person was later named to the 2013 Pro Bowl, his twelveth.
